casebody.data:
STATE
v.
GROUP 1999-1152 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 9, 2019

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On appellee's motion to set execution date. Motion granted. Scott A. Group's sentence shall be carried into execution by the warden of the Southern Ohio Correctional Facility or, in his absence, by the deputy warden on Wednesday, January 10, 2024, in accordance with the statutes so provided.

O'CONNOR, C.J., and KENNEDY, FRENCH, FISCHER, DEWINE, DONNELLY, and STEWART, JJ., concur.
